appName.description: App name, 1. sampleapp - reactjs, nextjs, gatsby, angular. 2. starterapp - reactjs-starter, nextjs-starter, gatsby-starter, angular-starter, nuxt-starter

directory.description: Directory to setup the project. If directory name has a space then provide the path as a string or escap the space using back slash eg: "../../test space" or ../../test\ space
